metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, I'd Have You Anytime is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: I'd Have You Anytime has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and A Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
